title: Exceeding the speed limit is prohibited
description: No one shall drive a vehicle at a speed exceeding the limit specified in the Motor Vehicles Act

title: Exceeding weight limits is prohibited
description: No one shall drive a vehicle carrying a load exceeding the weight limit specified in the Motor Vehicles Act

title: Officers authorized by the government have the right to check if the vehicle’s weight exceeds the permitted limit
description: Officers authorized by the government have the right to check if the vehicle’s weight exceeds the permitted limit.

title: Driving dangerously is prohibited
description: No one shall drive a vehicle in a manner that is dangerous to the public.

title: Leaving the vehicle in a dangerous position is prohibited
description: No one shall abandon a vehicle in a manner that causes danger or obstruction to others.

title: Prohibition on traveling on running boards, etc.
description: No person should travel on the running board or outside the vehicle's body.

title: Prohibition on traveling without a pass or ticket
description: No person shall travel in a vehicle without a valid pass or ticket.

title: Ensuring the stationary vehicle’s safety
description: The driver should ensure that the vehicle is not left in a dangerous position.

title: Measures for the safety of drivers and pillion riders on two-wheelers
description: A driver should not carry more than one person on a two-wheeler and must follow safety measures.

title: Precautions at unguarded railway level crossings
description: The driver must stop the vehicle and ensure that no train is approaching before crossing.

title: Duty to stop in certain cases
description: The driver must stop the vehicle when required by a police officer or other authorized persons.

title: Duty of the driver in case of an accident
description: The driver must secure medical aid for injured persons and report the accident to the police.
